name: BlowBack City
description:
*WARNING: SUPER EARLY ACCESS*

Welcome to BlowBack City, a CyberPop stacked city, brimming with music, neon lights, and the occasional bullet train. The beautiful Neon Utopia has been taken over by it's own corrupted police department, sealing the city off from the outside world. You play as Brandy, a resistance fighter with experimental weaponry and a blind lust for vengeance. Plow through the rooftop pathways, cluttered office buildings, opulent greenhouses, penthouses, and more with ease, using your signature rifle, "Dot," who's special ammunition allows for "interesting" movement options. Collect all the coins, defeat all the bad guys, get to the flag... BUT FAST!

CONTROLS:

WASD: Move

SPACE: Jump

X: Load Normal Bullet

C: Load Knockback Bullet

LEFTCLICK: Shoot Bullet
